sentence.Network_en: Mona climbed the rickety wooden stairway.

sentence.Network_en: The stone stairway was covered with lichen.
Paintwork on the corner of a stairway tends to get nicked and scratched as people pass by.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着人们的走动,楼梯转角上的油漆慢慢地有了缺损和擦伤.

entry.def: A stairway is a staircase or a flight of steps, inside or outside a building.

means.word_mean: 1. a way of access consisting of a set of steps
